QuickAccessLinks.title: Allen School Monthly Information Session
QuickAccessLinks.content: Allen School Monthly Information Session The Allen School offers an information session for prospective high school students on the first Friday of every month from 3: 30PM - 4: 30PM PT. All information sessions online via Zoom until further notice. You can join us via Zoom here:

QuickAccessLinks.title: Meet with a Current Allen School Student
QuickAccessLinks.content: Prospective students can schedule a virtual appointment via zoom to meet with one of our Allen School ambassadors who are current students studying Computer Science or Computer Engineering. These meetings are intended for K-12 students to ask questions and learn more about the student experience.

QuickAccessLinks.title: Allen School Resources for High School Students
QuickAccessLinks.content: View the UW Allen School page to see all the resources that are available to prospective Allen School students.

QuickAccessLinks.title: Allen School Graduation Requirements
QuickAccessLinks.content: Degree Requirements | Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science & Engineering (washington.edu)

QuickAccessLinks.title: Allen School Non-Major Courses
QuickAccessLinks.content: If you are not admitted directly into the Allen School, you still have the option to take Non-Major courses which are CSE courses open to anyone at the UW.
